name: Monolith
tagline: A WordPress starter theme built with Twitter Bootstrap
body:
# MONOLITH

**Monolith is a starter theme for WordPress build with Twitter's [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/) framework.**

We've created Monolith to be a lean & efficient starting point for all our in-house WordPress project â€“ it provides us with the basic layouts and shortcodes we need to build almost any kind of project.

Instead of cramming the theme with support for countless features, we've instead built something which can be easily extended, and repeats itself as little as possible. Monolith won't do everything you need right out of the box, but will give you a solid foundation upon which to build any type of WordPress site.

Monolith was lovingly hand-made by the team at [@bigspringweb](http://www.twitter.com/bigspringweb)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
